attributes.action: Give petitioners a chance to respond to PM responses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Responding to these petitions with a short sound bite that in many cases doesn't even touch on the subject of the petition, is not a considered response to the petition, and expecting the petitioners to accept the response as the last word on the subject is in many cases - absurd, degrading, frustrating and undemoractic. If this is truely an open forum for debate there should be some way for petitioners to show there acceptance or otherwise of the PMs responses to the petitions.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
